title: Cause of SRAS shift to the right

content.prompt: Which of the following would cause the short-run aggregate supply curve to shift to the right?

choices.label: An increase in the natural rate of unemployment
A decrease in the expected price level

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
